00041 class Region : public VarSet {
00042     private:
00044         double          _c;
00045 
00046     public:
00048         Region() : VarSet(), _c(1.0) {}
00049 
00051         Region(const VarSet & x, double c) : VarSet(x), _c(c) {}
00052         
00054         Region(const Region & x) : VarSet(x), _c(x._c) {}
00055 
00057         Region & operator=(const Region & x) {
00058             if( this != &x ) {
00059                 VarSet::operator=(x);
00060                 _c          = x._c;
00061             }
00062             return *this;
00063         }
00064 
00066         const double & c() const { return _c; }
00068         double & c() { return _c; }
00069 };

00073 class FRegion : public Factor {
00074     private:
00076         double _c;
00077 
00078     public:
00080         FRegion() : Factor(), _c(1.0) {}
00081 
00083         FRegion( const Factor & x, double c ) : Factor(x), _c(c) {}
00084         
00086         FRegion( const FRegion & x ) : Factor(x), _c(x._c) {}
00087 
00089         FRegion & operator=(const FRegion & x) {
00090             if( this != &x ) {
00091                 Factor::operator=(x);
00092                 _c = x._c;
00093             }
00094             return *this;
00095         }
00096 
00098         const double & c() const { return _c; }
00100         double & c() { return _c; }
00101 };

00105 class RegionGraph : public FactorGraph {
00106     public:
00108         BipartiteGraph          G;
00109 
00111         std::vector<FRegion>    ORs;
00112 
00114         std::vector<Region>     IRs;
00115 
00117         std::vector<size_t>     fac2OR;
00118 
00119 
00120     public:
00122         RegionGraph() : FactorGraph(), G(), ORs(), IRs(), fac2OR() {}
00123 
00125         RegionGraph( const FactorGraph &fg ) : FactorGraph(fg), G(), ORs(), IRs(), fac2OR() {}
00126 
00128         RegionGraph( const FactorGraph &fg, const std::vector<Region> &ors, const std::vector<Region> &irs, const std::vector<std::pair<size_t,size_t> > &edges );
00129         
00131         RegionGraph( const FactorGraph &fg, const std::vector<VarSet> &cl );
00132 
00134         RegionGraph( const RegionGraph &x ) : FactorGraph(x), G(x.G), ORs(x.ORs), IRs(x.IRs), fac2OR(x.fac2OR) {}
00135 
00137         RegionGraph & operator=( const RegionGraph &x ) {
00138             if( this != &x ) {
00139                 FactorGraph::operator=( x );
00140                 G = x.G;
00141                 ORs = x.ORs;
00142                 IRs = x.IRs;
00143                 fac2OR = x.fac2OR;
00144             }
00145             return *this;
00146         }
00147 
00149         virtual RegionGraph* clone() const { return new RegionGraph(*this); }
00150 
00152         virtual RegionGraph* create() const { return new RegionGraph(); }
00153 
00155         virtual void setFactor( size_t I, const Factor &newFactor, bool backup = false ) {
00156             FactorGraph::setFactor( I, newFactor, backup ); 
00157             RecomputeOR( I ); 
00158         }
00159 
00161         virtual void setFactors( const std::map<size_t, Factor> & facs, bool backup = false ) {
00162             FactorGraph::setFactors( facs, backup );
00163             VarSet ns;
00164             for( std::map<size_t, Factor>::const_iterator fac = facs.begin(); fac != facs.end(); fac++ )
00165                 ns |= fac->second.vars();
00166             RecomputeORs( ns ); 
00167         }
00168 
00169 
00171         const FRegion & OR(size_t alpha) const { return ORs[alpha]; }
00173         FRegion & OR(size_t alpha) { return ORs[alpha]; }
00174 
00176         const Region & IR(size_t beta) const { return IRs[beta]; }
00178         Region & IR(size_t beta) { return IRs[beta]; }
00179 
00181         size_t nrORs() const { return ORs.size(); }
00183         size_t nrIRs() const { return IRs.size(); }
00184 
00185 
00187         const Neighbors & nbOR( size_t alpha ) const { return G.nb1(alpha); }
00189         Neighbors & nbOR( size_t alpha ) { return G.nb1(alpha); }
00190 
00192         const Neighbors & nbIR( size_t beta ) const { return G.nb2(beta); }
00194         Neighbors & nbIR( size_t beta ) { return G.nb2(beta); }
00195 
00196 
00198         void Calc_Counting_Numbers();
00200         bool Check_Counting_Numbers();
00201 
00203         void RecomputeORs();
00204 
00206         void RecomputeORs( const VarSet & ns );
00207 
00209         void RecomputeOR( size_t I );
00210 
00211         // Friends
00212         friend std::ostream & operator << ( std::ostream & os, const RegionGraph & rg );
00213 };
